descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffe599][size=4]Hoddminir[/size][/color] project has an abundance of fine resources for modders:
[size=5] [color=#ffe599]*[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55158/?]Flowers[/url]
 [color=#ffe599]*[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38651/?]Plants and Trees[/url]
 [color=#ffe599]*[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19066/?]Ground Textures[/url]
 [color=#ffe599]*[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58859/?]Runestones[/url]
[/size]Credits for all of these to Elinen

[size=4]
This is a catalogue of Hoddminir texture packs for modders.
[/size]For each resource set, this package contains two images: 1) black background jpg b) transparent png
Eight images files in total. Online copies:

[url=https://i.imgur.com/wCOENwY.jpg]Flowers Catalogue[/url]
[url=https://i.imgur.com/n8sguTI.jpg]Plants and Trees Catalogue[/url]
[url=https://i.imgur.com/pG08PBJ.jpg]Ground Textures Catalogue[/url]
[url=https://i.imgur.com/5JmrnX3.jpg]Runestones Catalogue[/url]
author: Snufkin
